Quantum is a non-custodial Web3 wallet that has been built from the ground up, incorporating newly redefined standards to provide an exceptional user experience for modern Web3 applications. Our core focus lies in ensuring security, privacy, and UX as our top priorities.

Features:

- True Multichain: With our innovative multichain approach, our wallet enables seamless interaction with various networks for every Web3 application. There's no longer a need to constantly switch between networks within the wallet app, as each Web3 app can independently connect to the desired network, The wallet additionally offers an upgraded version of the RPC API, which provides enhanced support for extra multichain capabilities to Web3 applications. 

- Cross-Chain Swap: Swap and Bridge assets across different chains without hassle.

-  Buy and Sell Crypto:  Buy and sell crypto directly from your Quantum Wallet, Now using ramp technology integrated into our wallet no need for CEX to buy or sell crypto.

- Multi-Wallet: Consolidate all your wallets in a single location with our wallet app, which allows you to store multiple wallets simultaneously. It offers a convenient method for effortlessly switching between your wallets and accounts.

- Security: Our security layer is one of our top priorities, and we invest significant effort into its development. We take great care to ensure that all your sensitive data is securely protected and encrypted.

and more...
